powers.name: Prestige.Prestige_Costumes.Consortium_Guard
powers.display_help: Time to dress up and have some fun. This costume will let you dress up as a Security Guard at any time. Note that the costume is mutually exclusive with most self-stealth powers, and cannot be used while shape shifted.
